docs.text:
MCVI


 


The Monte Carlo Value Iteration (MCVI) offline solver for 
POMDPs.jl
.


Described in


Bai, H., Hsu, D., 
 Lee, W. S. (2014). Integrated perception and planning in the continuous space: A POMDP approach. 
The International Journal of Robotics Research
, 33(9), 1288-1302.




Installation


Pkg.clone(
https://github.com/JuliaPOMDP/MCVI.jl
)






Documentation


Behavior is controlled using 
solver options
.

docs.text: The Monte Carlo Value Iteration (MCVI) offline solver for  POMDPs.jl .  Described in  Bai, H., Hsu, D.,   Lee, W. S. (2014). Integrated perception and planning in the continuous space: A POMDP approach.  The International Journal of Robotics Research , 33(9), 1288-1302.
docs.title: MCVI

docs.text: Behavior is controlled using  solver options .
docs.title: Documentation

docs.text:
Solver


Solver Options are controlled throught the MCVISolver keyword constructor:


#


MCVI.MCVISolver
 
 
Method
.


Hyperparameters:

- `n_iter`          : Number of iterations
- `num_particles`   : Number of belief particles to be used
- `obs_branch`      : Branching factor [default 8?]
- `num_state`       : Number of states to sample from belief [default 500?]
- `num_prune_obs`   : Number of times to sample observation while pruning alpha edges [default 1000?]
- `num_eval_belief` : Number of times to simulate while evaluating belief [default 5000?]
- `num_obs`         : [default 50?]
docs.title: Solver

docs.text:
Solver Options are controlled throught the MCVISolver keyword constructor:  #  MCVI.MCVISolver     Method .  Hyperparameters:

- `n_iter`          : Number of iterations
- `num_particles`   : Number of belief particles to be used
- `obs_branch`      : Branching factor [default 8?]
- `num_state`       : Number of states to sample from belief [default 500?]
- `num_prune_obs`   : Number of times to sample observation while pruning alpha edges [default 1000?]
- `num_eval_belief` : Number of times to simulate while evaluating belief [default 5000?]
- `num_obs`         : [default 50?]
